messages.content: Lucy said: 'The Tory and Lib Dem government just don't understand that Britain succeeds when ordinary families succeed. People in Manchester are £1600 a year worse off now than at the last election. We need a plan to help make work pay, to restore our NHS and to give young people hope for the future.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours
More daycare and nurses paid for by a Mansion Tax
Increase the minimum wage to £8 an hour

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tory and Lib Dem government

issues.economy: People in Manchester are £1600 a year worse off now than at the last election.
issues.education: More daycare and nurses paid for by a Mansion Tax
issues.health: Guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born and raised in Manchester and I live here with my husband and three children. It has been an honour to serve as your MP since 2012 — one of the most humbling and rewarding roles going.

quotes.text: We need a plan to help make work pay, to restore our NHS and to give young people hope for the future.

images.caption: Lucy Powell MP with Moss Side Councillors at enterprise centre The Pod
